subject: Tennis
Officiating (Sports)
Watches and Clocks
lead_paragraph: Some of today’s stars intentionally engage in slow play, a strategy that could come to an end with the installation of a mandate to get the ball back in play by a set time.
snippet: Some of today’s stars intentionally engage in slow play, a strategy that could come to an end with the installation of a mandate to get the ball back in play by a set time.
